sentences.en: How much money does he nave?
I shall nave to do the sum again, I think I've got the answer wrong.
sentences.cn: 我要把这道题重算一遍, 我想我是把答案弄错了.

sentences.en: If I made big money, you would nave a cut of the cake.
sentences.cn: 我要是赚了大钱的话, 少不了有你的一份.

sentences.en: Latin navis is feminine, for example, as is nave in Spanish and Italian.
sentences.cn: 例如, 拉丁语中navis是 阴性, 西班牙语和意大利语中nave也是阴性,但是法语词.

sentences.en: Our dog was growing old and blind, and would nave to be put to sleep.
sentences.cn: 我们的狗已衰老失明, 该令其长眠安息了.

sentences.en: People gathered in the nave of the house.
sentences.cn: 人们聚拢在房子的中间.

sentences.en: She doesn't nave her own breakfast until she has got the children off to school.
sentences.cn: 直到把孩子们都打发上学了,她才吃早餐.

sentences.en: The central nave was slightly larger than the two side aisles taken together.
sentences.cn: 中间的中殿比紧邻的两个中殿稍大.

sentences.en: The family on the other side of the nave had a certain look about them, too.
sentences.cn: 在中殿另一边的那一家人, 也有着自己特有的相貌.

sentences.en: The police nave turned up a lot of new information about the wanted man.
sentences.cn: 警察总部收集了很多有关那个通缉犯的新情况.

sentences.en: We joined the Nave to see the world, and what did we see? We saw the sea!
sentences.cn: 我们参加海军,想见见世面, 可是我们见到了什么 呢 ?我们见到的是大海!

sentences.en: We nave opened a confirmed credit in your favour.
sentences.cn: 我们已开出以贵方为受益人的保兑信用证.

sentences.en: What nave you done with my pen?
sentences.cn: 你把我的钢笔弄到哪儿去了?

sentences.en: You could nave worked that out for yourself if you hadn't such thick heads.
sentences.cn: 如果你们不笨的话,自己就能把那个算出来了.

words.tran_cn: （教堂的）[建]中殿；（铁路车站等建筑的）中央广场；车轮的中心部

trans.tran_cn: 教堂正厅，本堂，中央部，车轮的中心部
trans.tran_en: the long central part of a church
